ack.p: We thank R. Mota for field and laboratory assistance, and the Manacapuru municipal vector control staff and Manacapuru Health Department for their crucial help during the trial. We also thank the Fundação de Vigilância em Saúde do Amazonas of the Amazonas State Health Department. This paper is contribution number 27 of the Research Program on Infectious Disease Ecology in the Amazon (RP-IDEA) of the Instituto Leônidas e Maria Deane–Fundação Oswaldo Cruz.
